title: Client for Central Bank APIs
text: bbk minimal R client following APIs: Deutsche Bundesbank (BBk) European Central Bank (ECB) Swiss National Bank (SNB) Bank England (BoE) Banco de España (BdE) future, may extended central banks financial institutions. Feel free open issue specific request.

title: Client for Central Bank APIs
text: can install released version bbk CRAN : development version GitHub :
code: install.packages("bbk") # install.packages("pak") pak::pak("m-muecke/bbk")

title: Client for Central Bank APIs
text: bbk functions prefixed according central bank access (bbk_, ecb_, snb_, boe_) follow naming conventions respective APIs. typical workflow involves: Finding time series identifier relevant central bank’s website Using appropriate bbk function retrieve data
code: library(bbk)  # Deutsche Bundesbank - fetch 10 year daily yield curve yield_curve <- bbk_data(   flow = "BBSIS",   key = "D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A",   start_period = "2020-01-01" )

title: Client for Central Bank APIs
text: SNBdata: R package downloading data Swiss National Bank (SNB). bundesbank: R scripts downloading time-series data Bundesbank. ecb: R interface European Central Bank’s Statistical Data Warehouse (SDW) API. pdfetch: R package downloading economic financial time series public sources. readsdmx: R package reading SDMX data metadata. rsdmx: R package reading SDMX data metadata. tidyBdE: R package accessing Banco de España’s API.

what: bbk: Client for Central Bank APIs — bbk-package
title: bbk: Client for Central Bank APIs — bbk-package
text: client retrieving data metadata major central bank APIs. supports access 'Bundesbank SDMX Web Service API' (https://www.bundesbank.de/en/statistics/time-series-databases/help--sdmx-web-service/web-service-interface-data), 'Swiss National Bank Data Portal' (https://data.snb.ch/en), 'European Central Bank Data Portal API' (https://data.ecb.europa.eu/help/api/overview), 'Bank England Interactive Statistical Database' (https://www.bankofengland.co.uk/boeapps/database).

title: bbk: Client for Central Bank APIs — bbk-package
text: Maintainer: Maximilian Mücke muecke.maximilian@gmail.com (ORCID)

title: Returns Bundesbank data for a given flow and key — bbk_data
code: bbk_data(   flow,   key = NULL,   start_period = NULL,   end_period = NULL,   first_n = NULL,   last_n = NULL )

title: Returns Bundesbank data for a given flow and key — bbk_data
text: https://www.bundesbank.de/en/statistics/time-series-databases/help--sdmx-web-service/web-service-interface-data

title: Returns Bundesbank data for a given flow and key — bbk_data
text: flow (character(1)) flow query, 5-8 characters. See bbk_metadata() available dataflows. key (character(1)) key query. start_period (character(1)) start date data. Supported formats: YYYY annual data (e.g., "2019") YYYY-S[1-2] semi-annual data (e.g., "2019-S1") YYYY-Q[1-4] quarterly data (e.g., "2019-Q1") YYYY-MM monthly data (e.g., "2019-01") YYYY-W[01-53] weekly data (e.g., "2019-W01") YYYY-MM-DD daily business data (e.g., "2019-01-01") NULL, start date restriction applied (data retrieved earliest available date). Default NULL. end_period (character(1)) end date data, format start_period. NULL, end date restriction applied (data retrieved recent available date). Default NULL. first_n (numeric(1)) number observations retrieve start series. NULL, restriction applied. Default NULL. last_n (numeric(1)) number observations retrieve end series. NULL, restriction applied. Default NULL.

title: Returns Bundesbank data for a given flow and key — bbk_data
text: data.table::data.table() requested data.

what: Returns the available Bundesbank metadata — bbk_metadata
title: Returns the available Bundesbank metadata — bbk_metadata
text: Retrieval metadata stored Bundesbank's time series database. Access via SDMX Web Service API Bundesbank.

title: Returns the available Bundesbank metadata — bbk_metadata
code: bbk_metadata(type, id = NULL, lang = c("en", "de"))

title: Returns the available Bundesbank metadata — bbk_metadata
text: https://www.bundesbank.de/en/statistics/time-series-databases/help--sdmx-web-service/web-service-interface-metadata

title: Returns the available Bundesbank metadata — bbk_metadata
text: type (character(1)) type metadata query. One : "datastructure", "dataflow", "codelist", "concept". id (character(1)) id query. Default NULL. lang (character(1)) language query, either "en" "de". Default "en".

title: Returns the available Bundesbank metadata — bbk_metadata
text: data.table::data.table() queried metadata. columns : id id metadata name name metadata

title: Returns ECB data for a given flow and key — ecb_data
text: flow (character(1)) flow query. key (character(1)) key query. start_period (character(1)) start date data. Default NULL. end_period (character(1)) end date data, format start_period. NULL, end date restriction applied (data retrieved recent available date). Default NULL. first_n (numeric(1)) number observations retrieve start series. NULL, restriction applied. Default NULL. last_n (numeric(1)) number observations retrieve end series. NULL, restriction applied. Default NULL.

what: Returns Swiss National Bank (SNB) data for a given id — snb_data
title: Returns Swiss National Bank (SNB) data for a given id — snb_data
text: Returns Swiss National Bank (SNB) data given id

title: Returns Swiss National Bank (SNB) data for a given id — snb_data
code: snb_data(id, start_date = NULL, end_date = NULL, lang = c("en", "de"))

title: Returns Swiss National Bank (SNB) data for a given id — snb_data
text: https://data.snb.ch/en

title: Returns Swiss National Bank (SNB) data for a given id — snb_data
text: id (character(1)) id time series. start_date (character(1) | Date(1)) start date time series. end_date (character(1) | Date(1)) end date time series. lang (character(1)) language query, either "en" "de". Default "en".

title: Returns Swiss National Bank (SNB) data for a given id — snb_data
text: data.table::data.table() requested data.

title: bbk 0.6.0
text: CRAN release: 2025-02-02 Migration data.table package. Internal data manipulation now done using data.table functions return data.table objects. Support Swiss National Bank (SNB) data.

title: bbk 0.5.0
text: CRAN release: 2024-12-02 New function ecb_euro_rates() get euro foreign exchange reference rates European Central Bank (ECB).

title: bbk 0.4.0
text: CRAN release: 2024-07-08 Support European Central Bank (ECB) data.

title: bbk 0.3.0
text: CRAN release: 2024-06-12 Prefix function name changed bb_ bbk_. Allow multiple keys bbk_data(). Dynamically parse column names bbk_data(). Support /data/flowRef endpoint.

title: bbk 0.2.0
text: CRAN release: 2024-04-30 Remove missing rows bb_series(). Better title unit parsing bb_series().
